revised_title: Anatomical and Pharmaceutical Treatises by Glisson and Charas
tldr: The article discusses two books: one by Franciscus Glisson, focusing on human anatomy and the other by Moyse Charas, covering pharmaceutical and chemical preparations. Glisson's treatise explores the inner workings of the human body, while Charas' work provides a comprehensive guide to pharmacy, including preparation methods and medicinal compositions.
